Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2011 08:41AM smilie wrote: I'm joining the July group too....I start my rads next Thursday July 21..my dry run is on Wed. I've already bought my aloe and Aquaphor, thanks for all the info regarding creams! I'm trying to be as positive as I can be(and I am a wicked positive chick!)...and am dealing with a great bunch of nurses/dr's, really upbeat office! My appt's are scheduled for 1pm every day....so for 6 weeks I'm having a lunch date with 'Ray'. I wish all of you wellness and positive energy !
Posts.Title: July 2011 rads Merilee jankc

Posts.Content: Jul 26, 2011 05:25AM smilie wrote: Kshav & Leelee...I was really hesitant about taking Tamoxifen...and I actually started it 3 weeks before I started rads and have not had one issue with it at all...if if works, it is SO worth it. Good luck!~S
